item.Q:
Write the character:
1: big; huge; large; major; great; wide; deep; oldest; eldest
2: doctor
item.A:
1: dà 2: dài
广大 (廣大) guǎngdà vast; extensive 大夫 dàifu doctor; minister of state (in pre-Han states)

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: within; among; in; middle; center; while (doing sth); during; China; Chinese
2: hit (the mark)
item.A:
1: zhōng 2: zhòng
中国 (中國) Zhōngguó China; Middle Kingdom 中毒 zhòngdú to be poisoned; poisoning

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: can; be possible; be able to; to assemble; to meet; to gather; to see; union; group; association
2: to balance an account; accounting
item.A:
traditional: 會
1: huì 2: kuài
社会 (社會) shèhuì society 会计 (會計) kuàijì accountant; accounting

item.Q:
Write the character:
to be born; to give birth; life; to grow
item.A:
shēng
生产 (生產) shēngchǎn to produce; manufacture

tiān
今天 jīntiān today; at the present; now

item.Q:
Write the character:
work; worker; skill; profession; trade; craft; labor
item.A:
gōng
工作 gōngzuò job; work; construction; task

item.Q:
Write the character:
from; self; oneself; since
item.A:
zì
自己 zìjǐ self; (reflexive pronoun); own

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: 11 p.m.-1 a.m.; 1st earthly branch; child; midnight; son; child; seed; egg; small thing
2: (noun suff.)
item.A:
1: zǐ 2: zi
分子 fēnzǐ molecule; (math) numerator of a fraction 种子 (種子) zhǒngzi seed

item.Q:
Write the character:
country; nation; state; national; surname
item.A:
traditional: 國
guó
国家 (國家) guójīa country; nation

item.Q:
Write the character:
finish; complete; accomplish; become; turn into; win; succeed; one tenth; surname
item.A:
chéng
形成 xíngchéng to form; to take shape

item.Q:
Write the character: dà

big; huge; large; major; great; wide; deep; oldest; eldest

item.Q:

item.A:
doctor

hit (the mark)

item.Q:
Write the character: chéng
(xíngchéng de chéng)
item.A:
finish; complete; accomplish; become; turn into; win; succeed; one tenth; surname Cheng
形成 xíngchéng to form; to take shape
rìzi day; a (calendar) date; days of one's life

traditional: 節日
jiérì holiday; festival

traditional: 陰曆
yīnlì lunar calendar

traditional: 農曆
nónglì the traditional Chinese calendar; the lunar calendar

traditional: 陽曆
yánglì solar calendar
shēngrì birthday

traditional: 結婚紀念日
jiéhūnjìniànrì wedding anniversary

traditional: 中秋節
zhōngqiūjié the Mid-Autumn Festival on 15th of 8th lunar month

traditional: 端午節
duānwǔjié The Dragon Boat Festival (the 5th day of the 5th lunar month)
yuándàn New Year's Day
chúxī (New Year's) Eve

traditional: 復活節
Fùhuójié Easter

traditional: 感恩節
Gǎnēnjié Thanksgiving Day

traditional: 國慶日
guóqìngrì national day of many countries; PRC National Day on Oct 1st; Taiwan National Day on Oct 10

traditional: 聖誕節
Shèngdànjié Christmas time; Christmas season; Christmas

traditional: 萬聖節
Wànshèngjié All Saints (Christian festival); Halloween

traditional: 告訴
gàosu to tell; to inform; to let know
gàosù to tell

traditional: 傳統
chuántǒng tradition; convention

traditional: 慶祝
qìngzhù celebrate

traditional: 豐盛
fēngshèng rich; sumptuous

traditional: 月餅
yuèbǐng moon cake (esp. for the Mid-Autumn Festival)

traditional: 從前
cóngqián previously; formerly

traditional: 農業
nóngyè agriculture; farming

traditional: 社會
shèhuì society
qiūtiān autumn

shōucheng harvest
shōuchéng harvest

traditional: 豐收
fēngshōu bumper harvest
dàzìrán nature (as in Mother Nature)

traditional: 恩賜
ēncì favor
jìbài to offer sacrifice (to one's ancestors)

traditional: 象徵
xiàngzhēng emblem; symbol; token

traditional: 蛋黃
dànhuáng egg yolk
biǎoshì to express; to show; to say; to state; to indicate

traditional: 團圓
tuányuán to have a reunion
